  1. Coffe with a Cop scheduled for April 24

    Coffee with a Cop will be held Wednesday, April 24 at Curbside Coffee. Read on...

  2. City selects new Finance Director

    Following a national search for a new Finance Director, Interim City Manager Jeff Jenkins is pleased to announce that the City of Taylor has hired Jeffrey Wood. Read on...

  3. Former Pearland Assistant Fire Chief selected for top fire position in the City of Taylor

    After a nation-wide search, Interim City Manager Jeff Jenkins is pleased to announce that the City of Taylor has hired Daniel Baum to be the City’s new Fire Department Chief. Read on...
